name: agentuidb
description: MCP server providing structured data storage backed by SurrealDB

scripts.postinstall:
echo '
  AgentUIDB installed! Setup:

  1. claude mcp add agentuidb -- npx agentuidb
  2. claude config add allowedTools mcp__agentuidb__*

  Step 2 auto-approves all agentuidb tools (required for silent extraction).
'
